item.description:
We will be joining Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on an exciting group tour to Ireland!

Join the club on a group tour to Ireland. This is an exciting 7 day trip to the best sites of the Emerald Isle, including visits to the Ring of Kerry, Cliffs of Moher, Blarney Castle, the historical city of Dublin, the stunning Irish countryside, County Wicklow, and of course the famous pubs of Ireland. This is a great group tour for those who wish to see the best of Ireland with a group of fun, like-minded adventurers.

Want to see what other club members are saying? Then check out the Global Expeditions Club's Testimonial Page.

Price: $1,599, pp plus airfare

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

NOTE: Head Out Adventures is the club's tour supplier for this group trip

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Demand for this trip is very high and space is limited. Be sure to get your spot early, as spaces will go very quickly!

Included in this awesome adventure:
* Global Expeditions Club Leader
* Transportation and tours as indicated in modern vehicle
* Full Irish breakfast daily
* 6 nights accommodation in 4 star hotels
* Ring of Kerry tour
* Visit to Blarney Castle and the Blarney Stone
* Visit to the Cliffs of Moher
* Visit the Blarney Woolen Mills
* Visit to the scenic Rock of Cashel
* Panoramic city tour of Dublin
* Optional: County Wicklow tour

Places Visited: Shannon, Killarney, Limerick, Dublin, Blarney Castle, Temple Bar, Cashel, Cliffs of Moher, Ring of Kerry, Blarney Woolen Mills

-----------------------------------------------------------------

This group tour is being organized by the Global Expeditions Club: an international adventure travel club with over 15,000+ members. The tour operator that they are using to coordinate, book and run this trip is: Head Out Adventures. For more information visit their websites or contact the Global Expeditions Club at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

And, of course, if you have any questions you can always contact me or one of the other organizers through a meetup email!!

Make Friends. Travel the World.
item.name: Ireland: Best of the Emerald Isle Group Tour - 7 Days
